data.message: How about you come up with a video streamer that works or put back what actually works? It never buffers enough so you get 2 frames, pause 3 frames, pause. And yes, I checked my Flash version and cleared my cache

replies.message: And I get it in all my browsers
Hi Ryan. We'd appreciate more information on the problems you're experiencing with video playback. Could you fill out this feedback form detailing these issues? http://bit.ly/2ekXQrj. -Nick
Thanks Ryan. We appreciate the input! -Nick
I have to admit I'm pleasantly surprised at the speed to which you acknowledged my issue.
Glad to help, Ryan. We truly appreciate all feedback from the Facebook community, and if there's issues to be corrected, we want to hear about them! -Nick

Can you please add my facebook live option back to my account? I had it and then woke up and it was gone. I have been asking for months. Thank you so much. I don't want to create a new account just to get it. PLEASE HELP!!
Hi Zakria. Here's a step-by-step guide on how to get your Page verified: http://bit.ly/2elrHjm. -Nick
